properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND FCATEGORY_NAME = ? OR SCATEGORY_NAME =?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG FROM TB_PRODUCT B WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FCATEGORY_NAME = ? OR SCATEGORY_NAME = ? ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT DISTINCT FCATEGORY_NAME, SCATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE FCATEGORY_NAME = (SELECT DISTINCT FCATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE SCATEGORY_NAME = ?) OR FCATEGORY_NAME = ?
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG FROM TB_PRODUCT ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT REVIEW_NO , MEMBER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , R_ENROLL_DATE , R_MODIFY_DATE FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND R_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_LIKE ( PRODUCT_NO, MEMBER_NO, P_LIKE_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, SYSDATE )
DELETE FROM TB_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BRAND LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG FROM TB_PRODUCT B WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BRAND LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG FROM TB_PRODUCT B WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PAYMENT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( select P.ORDER_NO, P.PAYMENT_DATE, P.PRICE, ( SELECT M.MEMBER_ID FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_ORDER O ON (M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO
) MEMBER_ID FROM TB_PAYMENT P JOIN TB_ORDERDETAIL OD ON (OD.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO) GROUP BY P.ORDER_NO, P.PRICE, P.PAYMENT_DATE, P.PAYMENT_NO ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT P.ORDER_NO, P.PAYMENT_DATE, PR.PRODUCT_IMG, PR.PRODUCT_NAME, OD.COUNT, ((PR.PRICE)* OD.COUNT)PRICE, M.MEMBER_ID, OD.PRODUCT_NO FROM TB_PAYMENT P JOIN TB_ORDERDETAIL OD ON (OD.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT PR ON (PR.PRODUCT_NO = OD.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TB_ORDER O ON (O.ORDER_NO = OD.ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*)COUNT FROM TB_ORDER

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.STATUS, NVL(WAYBILL, '미발급')WAYBILL, MEMBER_ID, O.MEMBER_NO, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_EMAIL, ADDRESS_NAME, O.ADDRESS, ADDRESS_TEL, USE_POINT, NVL(COURIER, '미지정')COURIER, PAYMENT_DATE FROM TB_ORDER O JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_PAYMENT P ON (P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.STATUS, NVL(WAYBILL, '미발급')WAYBILL, MEMBER_ID, O.MEMBER_NO, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_EMAIL, ADDRESS_NAME, O.ADDRESS, ADDRESS_TEL, USE_POINT, NVL(COURIER, '미지정')COURIER, PAYMENT_DATE, MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_ORDER O JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_PAYMENT P ON (P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) WHERE O.ORDER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_ORDER SET COURIER = ?, WAYBILL = ?, STATUS = 2 WHERE ORDER_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TB_STOCK ( STOCK_NO, PRODUCT_NO, COUNT, STATUS )
SELECT SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, PRODUCT_NO, COUNT, '출고' FROM TB_ORDERDETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_ORDER WHERE WAYBILL = ?
SELECT COUNT(*)COUNT FROM TB_ORDER WHERE STATUS = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.STATUS, NVL(WAYBILL, '미발급')WAYBILL, MEMBER_ID, O.MEMBER_NO, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_EMAIL, ADDRESS_NAME, O.ADDRESS, ADDRESS_TEL, USE_POINT, NVL(COURIER, '미지정')COURIER, PAYMENT_DATE FROM TB_ORDER O JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_PAYMENT P ON (P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) WHERE O.STATUS = ? ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , CAPACITY , BRAND , STOCK , PRODUCT_INFO , FCATEGORY_NAME , SCATEGORY_NAME , PRODUCT_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRONO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , CAPACITY , STOCK , BRAND FROM TB_PRODUCT B WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_IMG , PRODUCT_NO , FCATEGORY_NAME , SCATEGORY_NAME , PRODUCT_NAME , CAPACITY , BRAND , PRICE , STOCK , PRODUCT_INFO , ENROLL_DATE FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = ? , PRICE = ? , CAPACITY = ? , BRAND = ? , PRODUCT_INFO = ? , FCATEGORY_NAME = ? , SCATEGORY_NAME = ? , PRODUCT_IMG = ? WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_STOCK ( STOCK_NO , PRODUCT_NO , COUNT , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_CART ( PRODUCT_NO , MEMBER_NO , COUNT ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? )
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_IMG , PRODUCT_NAME || ' ' || CAPACITY || '(mL/g)' PRODUCT_NAME , COUNT , COUNT*PRICE PRICE , STOCK FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_CART SET COUNT = ? WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TB_CART
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_IMG , PRODUCT_NAME || ' ' || CAPACITY || '(mL/g)' PRODUCT_NAME , COUNT , COUNT*PRICE PRICE , STOCK FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO =
SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, TOTAL FROM TB_MEMBER LEFT JOIN TB_POINT p USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY POINT_NO DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO TB_ORDER ( ORDER_NO , MEMBER_NO , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , ADDRESS_NAME , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_TEL , USE_POINT ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_ONO.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_ORDERDETAIL ( DORDER_NO , ORDER_NO , PRODUCT_NO , COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_DONO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_PAYMENT ( PAYMENT_NO , ORDER_NO , PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PAYNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
SELECT MEMBER_GRADE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_POINT ( POINT_NO , AMOUNT , STATUS , TOTAL , CONTENT , ORDER_NO , MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PONO.NEXTVAL
SELECT ORDER_NO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, ORDER_NO FROM TB_ORDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STOCK

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT STOCK_NO , STOCK_DATE , PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME || ' ' || CAPACITY || '(mL/g)' PRODUCT_NAME , BRAND , COUNT , S.STATUS FROM TB_STOCK S JOIN TB_PRODUCT P USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y'
